sentences.cn: 阿森纳队踢得赏心悦目。

sentences.en: Each dress is beautifully finished off with piped seams and fitted underskirts.
sentences.cn: 每件连衣裙最后线缝都滚了边，并且加上了合身的衬裙，看起来非常漂亮。

sentences.en: He writes beautifully, as befits a poet.
sentences.cn: 他文笔优美，适合当诗人。

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: She sails beautifully in winds over 60 knots.
sentences.cn: 它扬着帆以超过60节的船速乘风破浪。

sentences.en: She was beautifully made-up, beautifully groomed.
She was great with the children and fitted in beautifully.
sentences.cn: 她和孩子们打交道很有一手，相处得十分融洽。

sentences.en: The book is beautifully illustrated throughout.
sentences.cn: 这本书从头到尾都有精美的插图。

sentences.en: The company makes wearable, beautifully cut clothes at affordable prices.
sentences.cn: 这家公司生产经久耐穿、外形美观且价格合理的服装。

sentences.en: The door is beautifully made in solid teak.
sentences.cn: 门是由纯柚木制成，做工精美。

sentences.en: The last track finishes this compilation beautifully.
sentences.cn: 整张选辑在最后一曲优美的旋律中结束。

sentences.en: They are always perfectly polite and beautifully mannered.
sentences.cn: 他们总是很懂礼貌，彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: This shampoo smells fruity and leaves the hair beautifully silky.
sentences.cn: 这款洗发水是果香型的，洗后头发如丝般顺滑。

words.tran_cn: 美；美丽；美人；美好的东西

trans.tran_cn: 美丽地，漂亮地，<口>出色地，完美地
